title: Deep Detox Treatment
author: Hannah H
description: Strengthens & Smooths This keratin-infused deep conditioning treatment, restores moisture, strengthens, stops frizz, conditions your scalp and reduces breakage. Keratin peptides encourage hair to heal and grow. Fruit extracts nourish and moisturize, leaving the hair feeling soft, smooth, and healthy. Great for all
cleaned_text: (Vanilla) Extract, Cetrimonium Flower Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract, Quercus Alba (White Oak) Bark Extract, Hamamelis Virginana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Rosa Canina (Dog Rose) Seed
